com.github.dandelion.core.bundle.loader

Class AbstractBundleLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.dandelion.core.bundle.loader.AbstractBundleLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BundleLoader
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DandelionBundleLoader

    public abstract class AbstractBundleLoader
extends Object
implements BundleLoader

    Abstract bundle loader in charge of loading JSON definitions of bundle.

    The JSON definitions are scanned in the folder specified by the BundleLoader.getScanningPath() method.

    Since:
    0.10.0
    Author:
    Romain Lespinasse, Thibault Duchateau
